title: Single of the Week: Nicolas Jaar – I Got A Woman
body: ![](http://www.fatberris.com/berri.dk/wp-content/photos/Nicolas+Jaar.jpg "Nico Jaar")Taken from his fantastic new full length LP Space Is Only Noise, I Got A Woman by Nicolas Jaar is this weeks single of the week. Drawing inspirations from house music, as well as dubstep and even classical elements, this track epitomizes everything that’s brilliant about Space Is Only Noise. Full of intriguing samples, chilled synths and blithe piano sections, I Got A Woman creates an otherworldly atmosphere in which the listener is immersed. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Drawing inspirations from house music, as well as dubstep and even classical elements, this track epitomizes everything that’s brilliant about Space Is Only Noise.
